attributes.action: Remove the new £20 note (2007) from circulation and bring bank the old one!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new £20 should be removed from circulation. Why does an English bank note bear a Scotsman and look so much like a Euro note? What was wrong with the old note?
Is this the way the government will move us towards the EU by gradually changing little by little until, right in front of our eyes we will no longer be English.
